text: Piermario Morosini (5 July 1986 â€“ 14 April 2012) was an Italian football player. On 14 April 2012 he suffered a cardiac arrest while he was playing a match with his team Livorno against the team Pescara. He died minutes after in the Civil Hospital of Pescara. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Footballers from Lombardy Category:Sportspeople from Bergamo
title: Piermario Morosini
